name: Broccoli Salad for a Crowd
author: Sharon Dyson-Demers
summary: Super easy salad for a crowd that's pretty and just a bit different. Great right away but gets better the longer it gets to marinate.
ingredients: 3 dashes hot pepper sauce (such as Frank's® RedHot), or more to taste
12 cups fresh broccoli florets, or more to taste
3 cups fruit and nut trail mix
½ large red onion, diced into 1/4-inch pieces
directions: Mix mayonnaise, sugar, vinegar, and hot sauce together in a bowl
Place bacon in a large skillet and cook over medium-high heat, turning occasionally, until evenly browned, about 10 minutes
Drain bacon slices on paper towels and let cool enough to handle, about 10 minutes
Combine crumbled bacon, broccoli, trail mix, and red onion together in a large serving bowl
